price: 71.Nabii Muusaa kee kadir badak afa gexak fooreeniih doynik keenil dardarteeh, tokkel kadir yeexegeeniih nooli maleh ken yukkuqen, tokkel usun doynik feeren waqdi kadir doynikik luc kaleeh tet boohayseh, tokkel Nabii Muusa: teetit yan mara xuumussamkeh tet boohassee? nummah atu diriggi как iyyaanama abtem kaak iyye.
arabic: فَٱنطَلَقَا حَتَّىٰٓ إِذَا رَكِبَا فِي ٱلسَّفِينَةِ خَرَقَهَاۖ قَالَ أَخَرَقۡتَهَا لِتُغۡرِقَ أَهۡلَهَا لَقَدۡ جِئۡتَ شَيۡـًٔا إِمۡرٗا

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: fa-inṭalaqā ḥattā idhā rakibā fī al-safīnati kharaqahā qāla akharaqtahā litugh'riqa ahlahā laqad ji'ta shayan im'ran
translations: he made a hole in it
Have you made a hole in it
